title: 服务器在进行tick循环时发生异常
txt_content:
dalao们帮帮忙，服务端是Mohist1.12.2
错误报告如下，而且夜晚睡眠无法过夜





---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  llibrary (llibrary-core-1.0.11-1.12.2.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([R键整理]c-1.63.jar)
  AppleCore ([苹果核mod核心]AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.2.0.jar)
  SSLoadingPlugin (SereneSeasons-1.12.2-1.2.18-universal.jar)
  CorePlugin (AcademyCraft-1.1.2.jar)
  PhosphorFMLLoadingPlugin ([光照优化]phosphor-1.12.2-0.2.6+build50-universal (1).jar)
  CorePlugin ([平滑字体]SmoothFont-mc1.12.2-2.1.1.jar)
  TransformLoader ([动态环绕]DynamicSurroundings-1.12.2-3.6.0.2.jar)
  McLib core mod (mclib-1.0.4-1.12.2.jar)
  ShutdownPatcher (mcef-1.12.2-0.9-coremod.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! (If you haven't disabled the FoamFix coremod, try disabling it in the config! Note that this bit of text will still appear.) ([优化]foamfix-0.10.5-1.12.2.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Why did you do that?

Time: 20-3-31 下午8:29
Description: 服务器在进行tick循环时发生异常 (Exception in server tick loop)

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:

replies.author: tito100
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 内存不足，尝试分配更多的内存

replies.author: Sssss...
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sssss... 于 2020-4-1 07:45 编辑 

java堆栈溢出了
内存设置多点



java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
内存溢出：java运行栈空间（不足）

tito100 发表于 2020-3-31 22:00
改bat 最大和最小内存设置一下
@echo off&setlocal enabledelayedexpansion        set a=-1:okset /a a+=1 ...
我调大内存后晚上谁觉还是无法过夜是什么原因？
